text: Neraudia is a genus of plants in family Urticaceae. All five species are endemic to Hawaii.Neraudia angulata. Final Implementation Plan for Makua Military Reservation. Ma'oloa is a common name for these plants. Species include: * Neraudia angulata * Neraudia melastomifolia, Gaud. * Neraudia ovata, Gaud. * Neraudia sericea ==References== Category:Urticaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neraudia
